languages.text: "В случае благоприятного развития сценария принесения жертвы твое тело не сгинет без цели, но будет подвергнуто священному анатомированию. Возрадуйся".
"In the event that the sacrifice scenario is executed successfully, your body will not perish without purpose, but will be subject to sacred dissection. Rejoice."
languages.original_text: "В случае благоприятного развития сценария принесения жертвы твое тело не сгинет без цели, но будет подвергнуто священному анатомированию. Возрадуйся".

traits.locale_text: "In the event that the sacrifice scenario is executed successfully, your body will not perish without purpose, but will be subject to sacred dissection. Rejoice."
"In the event that the sacrifice scenario is executed successfully, your body will not perish without purpose, but will be subject to sacred dissection. Rejoice."
"In the event that the sacrifice scenario is executed successfully, your body will not perish without purpose, but will be subject to sacred dissection. Rejoice."
"In the event that the sacrifice scenario is executed successfully, your body will not perish without purpose, but will be subject to sacred dissection. Rejoice."

languages.text: “如果你所说的自我牺牲成功执行的话，你的尸体不会被白白浪费，而是会接受神圣的解剖。本单位对这一设想感到喜悦。”
languages.original_text: "In the event that the sacrifice scenario is executed successfully, your body will not perish without purpose, but will be subject to sacred dissection. Rejoice."

traits.locale_text: “如果你所说的自我牺牲成功执行的话，你的尸体不会被白白浪费，而是会接受神圣的解剖。本单位对这一设想感到喜悦。”

languages.text: « Si le scénario du sacrifice se déroule comme prévu, votre corps ne périra pas en vain, mais sera sujet à une dissection sacrée. Réjouissez-vous. »
languages.original_text: "In the event that the sacrifice scenario is executed successfully, your body will not perish without purpose, but will be subject to sacred dissection. Rejoice."

traits.locale_text: « Si le scénario du sacrifice se déroule comme prévu, votre corps ne périra pas en vain, mais sera sujet à une dissection sacrée. Réjouissez-vous. »

languages.text: «En caso de que su sacrificio tenga éxito, su cuerpo no perecerá sin sentido, sino que será sometido a la sagrada disección. Puede alegrarse de ello».
languages.original_text: "In the event that the sacrifice scenario is executed successfully, your body will not perish without purpose, but will be subject to sacred dissection. Rejoice."

traits.locale_text: «En caso de que su sacrificio tenga éxito, su cuerpo no perecerá sin sentido, sino que será sometido a la sagrada disección. Puede alegrarse de ello».

languages.text: 「万一、犠牲となる脚本が成功しても、その身体が当てもなく死ぬことはない。神聖解剖に使ってやろう。喜べ」
languages.original_text: "In the event that the sacrifice scenario is executed successfully, your body will not perish without purpose, but will be subject to sacred dissection. Rejoice."

traits.locale_text: 「万一、犠牲となる脚本が成功しても、その身体が当てもなく死ぬことはない。神聖解剖に使ってやろう。喜べ」

languages.text: "Sollte das Opferszenario erfolgreich ausgeführt werden, wird Euer Körper nicht ohne Zweck verenden, sondern anschließend einer heiligen Zergliederung unterzogen. Frohlocket."
languages.original_text: "In the event that the sacrifice scenario is executed successfully, your body will not perish without purpose, but will be subject to sacred dissection. Rejoice."

traits.locale_text: "Sollte das Opferszenario erfolgreich ausgeführt werden, wird Euer Körper nicht ohne Zweck verenden, sondern anschließend einer heiligen Zergliederung unterzogen. Frohlocket."

languages.original_text: "In the event that the sacrifice scenario is executed successfully, your body will not perish without purpose, but will be subject to sacred dissection. Rejoice."

languages.text: "Fedakârlık senaryosunun başarıyla uygulanması durumunda beden amaçsızca yitmeyecek, kutsal tasnife tabi tutulacaktır. Ne mutlu."
languages.original_text: "In the event that the sacrifice scenario is executed successfully, your body will not perish without purpose, but will be subject to sacred dissection. Rejoice."
